title: Privacy Policy
introText: The following notes provide a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit our website.
dataCollectionText: Data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator.
rightsText: You have the right to receive information about the origin, recipient and purpose of your stored personal data free of charge at any time.
contactText: The responsible body for data processing on this website is: matbakh-app, Munich
googleText: This website uses Google services. By using it, you agree to data processing by Google.
